mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(dayTime, '%Y-%m') AS generateTime, SUM(dayCount) AS generateCount FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS dayTime, COUNT(1) AS dayCount FROM `balance_status_info` GROUP BY dayTime HAVING dayTime < DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') ) b GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime > DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER} MONTH), '%Y-%m' ) ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS generateTime, COUNT(1) AS generateCount FROM `balance_status_info` GROUP BY generateTime HAVING generateTime >= DATE_FORMAT( DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER} DAY), '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND generateTime<DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY generateTime DESC

SELECT t.createTime AS createTime, t.memberCount AS memberCount, t.activeLocation AS activeLocation FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H-%i-%s') FROM balance_status_info WHERE mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS createTime, ( SELECT COUNT(member_id) AS memberCount FROM balance_user_manger_info WHERE user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM balance_mac_manger_info WHERE mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ) AS memberCount, ( SELECT city FROM `balance_lianbi_active_info` WHERE mac = #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) AS activeLocation ) t
